Text: Sokol Blosser Winery Specialnsf For those of you interested in purchasing wine this holiday you will be able to take advantage of a discount currently being offered by Sokol Blosser Winery To order simply contact the Tasting Room Manager Lee Medina at x and tell him you are with Enron He will bill your personal credit card Happy Holidays A n n a

ACTION REQUIRED Time Entry Due nsf Its that time again The deadline for everyone to input hisher time into the system is Thursday November at pm Please enter your time today and send me an email to let me know that your time has been entered If you need help entering your time I would be happy to assist If you missed the last timeentry period you may select the link Previous in the Data Entry Period box Thanksgiving Thursday and Friday are to be left at zero hours If you have password or login troubles please call the SAP Center of Expertise at If you have questions please let me know Thank you in advance for your cooperation Anna x

Duke Energy Okanagon PE Douglas Countynsf Middle Marketing will be hosting our friendly competitors Duke Energy Okanogan PE and Douglas County throughout the day today Please see me if you have any questions or issues Thank you Anna Mehrer x

ACTION REQUIRED Time Entry Due nsf Its that time again The deadline for everyone to input hisher time into the system is Wednesday November at pm Please enter your time today and send me an email to let me know that your time has been entered If you need help entering your time I would be happy to assist If you missed the last timeentry period you may select the link Previous in the Data Entry Period box If you have password or login troubles please call the SAP Center of Expertise at Also if you are interested in ordering a calendar please stop by my desk to view a catalogue If you have questions please let me know Thank you in advance for your cooperation Anna x

Last chance Dave Ryan Cc Dave Ryan our meteorologist from Houston will be in the office this Thursday and Friday November th and th He will be presenting weather skill testing and weather forecasts on the th from and on the th from luncheon meetingplease see me if you have special dietary requirements If you would like to attend either of these meetings please let me know by the end of tomorrow Tuesday Thank you Best regards Anna

Mark Guzman and Turret Cc Hi Chip Mark Guzman needs a turret ID and also the associated programming so that his extension rings at his desk He is currently assigned extension but it only rings at reception Let me know if you need any other information Thanks Anna

ACTION REQUIRED Time Entry Due nsf Its that time again The deadline for everyone to input hisher time into the system is TuesdayOctober at pm Please enter your time today and send me an email to let me know that your time has been entered If you need help entering your time I would be happy to assist If you missed the last timeentry period you may select the link Previous in the Data Entry Period box Please remember to enter the receiver cost center number on your timesheet If your cost center number is already you dont need to enter it Also for those of you who havent ordered calendars please let me know if you are interested in picking one out If you have questions please let me know Thank you in advance for your cooperation Anna x

Extra PGE Park Tickets for Tonightnsf For those of you interested in obtaining tickets for opening night tonight at PGE Park please email me by PM today Who Portland Beavers vs Fresno Grizzlies When PM Tonight Where PGE Park formerly Civic Stadium Two tickets per employee first come first served Please email me to indicate interest Thanks Anna

Tracy Ngo ResignationPST I regret to inform the Portland office that Tracy Ngo has resigned from her position effective immediately Although it will be tough to fill her shoes Susan Rance will be coordinating with the rest of the credit department to help us address credit issues Please refer all questions and inquiries regarding credit to Susan Chris Calger and Tim Belden

Enron Luau PhotosPST All Enron Luau photos are available for viewing in the photo album behind Kathy Axfords desk while some of them are available electronically at pAdmin AssistantsParties Luau Relive the memories

FW Travel Cancellation Holden Salisbury PST Original Message From Cynthia Biggs mailto Sent Monday October PM To Mehrer Anna Subject RE Travel Cancellation Holden Salisbury Hi Anna Due to the amount of refunds the airlines got from all the cancellations that week it wouldnt surprise me if it took days to get his refund Let me know if you need anything else thanks cynthia From Mehrer AnnaSMTPAnna NRONcom Sent Monday October PM To Salisbury Holden Cc Cynthia Email Subject RE Travel Cancellation Holden Salisbury It may show up in two billing cycles You may dispute the charge by calling American Express so that they can deduct it from your balance due Let me know if it doesnt show up in two billing cycles Anna Original Message From Salisbury Holden Sent Monday October PM To Mehrer Anna Cc Chatterton Jill Subject RE Travel Cancellation Holden Salisbury I have not received a credit for this charge on my Amex How can I follow up on this Thanks Holden Original Message From Mehrer Anna Sent Thursday September AM To Salisbury Holden Cc Chatterton Jill Subject FW Travel Cancellation Holden Salisbury Holden You should expect a credit on your Amex Anna Original Message From Cynthia Biggs FW Lodging Itinerary Confirmation for Hotel Monaco DenverPST Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday September AM To Mehrer Anna Subject Lodging Itinerary Confirmation for Hotel Monaco Denver Reservation confirmed Here are the details of your paidinfull reservation including any rules and restrictions If you have any questions fill out our Itinerary Assistance Form pubagentdllqscrfbakSubjitidCalrjavascripthistoryback to send us email or call us at EXPEDIA or Refer to Expediacom booking ID Your reservation information Itinerary name Denver Colorado Itinerary number Main contact Holden Salisbury Expediacom booking ID Email Room rate per night Taxes service fees per night Total charged to your credit card Expedia Special Rate Guests adult This lodging may add service fees or charges for optional incidentals such as minibar snacks or telephone calls upon checkout The price you selected does not include these costs etahotitingifWed Sep night Hotel Monaco Denver Kimpton Hotels Group hotelslogosgif Champa Street Denver Colorado United States of America Check in Wed Sep Check out Thu Sep Reservation questions EXPEDIA For other information T el Fax Hotel class star etahotstargif Read more about these accommodations pubagentdllqscrdspvhtiditidfromi Roomunit type Standard Additional information about your reservation Your credit card has been charged in full To make cancellations or changes please call EXPEDIA or Please specify that you booked an Expedia Special Rate If you change or cancel your plans please cancel your lodging reservation in advance in accordance with the propertys cancellation policy If this is a lodging reservation added to a flight itinerary and your reserved flight is not yet purchased your flight reservation will be canceled within hours Your lodging reservation will be canceled as well If rates are listed below they may be quoted in the currency of the country where the lodging is located Property policies Minimum check in age is Maximum guests per room is Maximum adults per room is Maximum children per room is This hotel considers guests aged and under at time of travel to be children Payment and deposit information Credit card will be charged for the total cost listed above at the time of booking No prices or hotel availability are guaranteed until full payment is received Rooms are provided by Travelscapecom Inc under an agency agreement with Expedia Inc Cancellation and changes Cancellations can be made online To make changes please call EXPEDIA or and specify that you booked an Expedia Special Rate If you wish to book multiple rooms you must use a different name for each room or the duplicate reservation will be cancelled by the hotel Cancellations or changes made within hours of the check in date are subject to a Night Room Tax penalty Cancellations or changes made more than hours from the check in date are subject to a penalty Thank you for choosing Expediacom for your travel reservations We look forward to serving you again Thank you for using the American Express Card Use the American Express Card for all of your travel and everyday spending and enjoy worldclass service Discover our online benefits dailypromosAmexamexjumpasp American Express etaamexcrdsgif pubagentdllqscropenitidupdt View your itinerary

PBS Blackout Broadcast Video AvailablePST If you are interested in borrowing a video tape of the PBS Frontline broadcast titled Blackout please see me This video features interviews with Ken Lay Jeff Skilling and other energy industry executives Best regards Anna Californias power disaster has made energy a frontburner issue for everyone Through interviews with state and federal officials power company executives and average citizens the documentary examines whether power companies and energy trading giants have capitalized on deregulation to make tremendous profits even as users suffer power shortages min Video Notes

Holiday Gifts for Customers Cc I will be putting together the holiday mailing for West Power Tradings customers I would like your input as to what gifts we should send and how many I should purchase in advance Following are my suggestions Sokol Blosser wines sent in wooden box with burned Enron logo bottles one Pinot Noir one Evolution white Sokol Blosser wines case bottles mixed or not Gift baskets of varying value from Baskets n More Omaha Steaks Ski lift passes Gift certificates you choose Enron logo items from our Signature Shop such as Swiss Army Knives Luggage Golf clubs and accessories Workspace accessories and writing instruments Portable lie detector Travel Atomic Alarm Clock Your request Please respond by next Friday August so that I may move forward with planning Thank you Anna

Saturday Sep Mt Taborto mark your calendars for our company picnic at Mt Tabor on Saturday September at Noon Bring your family A Hawaiian band and live hula dancers will provide the entertainment Games are to be played and prizes are to be won Nohos Hawaiian Cafe will be catering the event Remember to wear your aloha gear there will be a prize for best dressed Anna Embedded Microsoft Clip Gallery

Obtaining Rebatesnsf Just in case this is news to you Ive spoken with Ben Gwaltney AP in Houston about processing rebates He explained that when applying for the rebate have the rebate check payable to Enron Send the rebate check in on a Deposit Transmittal Form and code it with the same codes you had used to process the initial expense company expense code and cost center to which the rebate should be credited If a Deposit Transmittal Form is unavailable to you you can just staple the check to a piece of paper showing the appropriate codes Mail this deposit form with the rebate check via intercompany mail to Treasury Sam Round EB If Ive left someone off of this message who would find this information helpful please pass it on Have a good weekend Anna

Yogansf Anyone care to appeal the decision I know some people get reimbursed for example for a racquet club membership which is not technically a gym Also I think a yoga center qualifies as a health facility I dont want to cause a stink but I think this deserves discussion But maybe were back at square one trying to get something organized at the Fit Factory A Forwarded by Anna MehrerPDXECT on AM Amy FitzPatrick AM To Anna CT cc Subject Re Fitness Reimbursement Question Anna The fitness reimbursement is for gymhealth facility memberships only If the yoga classes are part of a fitness club they certainly can be included in the reimbursement up to Please let me know if you have any other questions Amy Anna Mehrer PM To Amy CT cc Subject Fitness Reimbursement Question Hi Amy I am interested in taking yoga classes and typically the yoga centers do not charge an annual sign on fee There are of course monthly fees or fees by the class Will I still be able to get reimbursed month but still not qualify for the annual fee reimbursement Please let me know as there are others also interested in yoga class reimbursement schedules Thanks Anna

Percentage Breakdown by Department Worksheetnsf Hello everyone Sometimes it is necessary to figure out how certain costs can be distributed evenly and fairly among our groups here at the Portland West Desk Below you will find an attachment that will automatically calculate the percentage breakdown for each group after entering the total amount in the space provided The cell above enter bill total here is the sum of the column to its left It should equal the bill total Please let me know if you have any questions Kind regards Anna

Cost Distribution Worksheetnsf Due to popular demand an Excel worksheet has been created in the famous Phonelist workbook thanks Teri and Lisa When you update the Cost Center list the numbers on the Cost Distribution tab will automatically update This further reinforces the importance of keeping that Cost Center list current If you have any other ideas or suggestions to add all the better Thanks for your patience Anna

US SuitesEnrons Corp Discount on Lodging Cc Hello For those of you who are not already familiar with Enron Broadbands arrangement with US Suites please know that ENA also falls under their contract for corporate housing rates Guests have no minimum requirement for their stay though after days they are eligible for a lower rate The rate for days is and days is Any Enron employee or guest of Enron may receive these rates They may also pay with their own credit card Most locations have a washer and dryer in unit among other fantastic amenities There are several locations in Portland including the Village at Lovejoy Fountain SW Lincoln Southpark Square SW Park Ave and Portland Center Apartments SW Harrison Please see Jessica or myself to view a brochure Other locations outside of Portland such as Boise Seattle and Albuquerque among others are also available Call to reserve a room You may also contact Cammie Lint Account Executive with US Suites at if you have more specific questions Best regards Anna

Auction Detailsnsf Hello I just spoke with Holly at Raphael House She said that the meeting on Thursday Nov will be at pm at the downtown Marriott SW Naitowithin walking distance from here The meeting will be held on the Ballroom Level which is one floor below the lobby If you are interested in the am Noon or Noon pm shifts on Saturday you are encouraged to attend this meeting If you cannot make the meeting then just show up at those times on Saturday I plan on going to the meeting on Thursday so let me know if youre interested in going together Thanks again and hopefully this is the last email Anna

Would you like free tickets to the Four TopsBill NonPrivilegedpst A doublebill of The Spinners Grammy nominations and The Four Tops Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductees will sing the night away in PGE Parks intimate seat amphitheater configuration tomorrow night Remember Then Came YouIll Be AroundOne Of A KindGames People Playand Rubberband Man Or how about Baby I Need Your LovingReach Out Ill Be ThereBernadetteMy Girland I Cant Help Myself Sugar Pie Honey Bunch Email call or see me if you are interested in obtaining free suite tickets for tomorrow nights event at PGE Park The benefit show starts at pm Anna x Portland Family Entertainment PFE and PGE Park are proud to announce Party at PGE Park a fundraiser celebrating the opening of PGE Park PFE has been very fortunate to have an outpouring of support from our community They want to acknowledge the communitys enthusiastic response to PGE Park by giving back to those organizations that make a difference for Oregon So they are hosting Party at PGE Park Party at PGE Park is a fundraiser and of the proceeds of our party will be distributed to three prominent local nonprofit organizations Stop Oregon Litter and Vandalism SOLV The Portland Oregon Sports Authority Foundation Special Olympics Oregon Embedded Microsoft Clip Gallery

Party at PGE Park Assistance NeededBill NonPrivilegedpst Original Message From Deborah Reyes mailto Sent Monday July PM Subject Party at PGE Park Assistance Needed We have a fantastic opportunity for employees of our sponsors and suite holder companies Due to last minute scheduling conflicts a large block of our volunteers for the Party at PGE Park this coming Friday had to cancel This has obviously created some last minute challenges for PGE Park but it is a great opportunity for your employees to volunteer a few hours of their time on behalf of some great causes plus see the Four Tops and The Spinners in concert for FREE Heres how Party at PGE Park is a fundraiser for the Portland Oregon Sports Authority SOLV and Special Olympics Oregon We are about volunteers short to assist with serving the VIP dinner Volunteers would work from pm to pm on assisting with the preconcert food service In exchage each volunteer will get two free tickets to that evenings concert plus a voucher for a free hot dog chips and soda This opportunity is open to your employees and spouses significant others or other adult family members Were sorry but children cannot volunteer for this particular opportunity Interested parties can call or email KATY BYRNE Director of Event Operations PGE Park Please share this information with your employees as you deem appropriate Obviously time is of the essence in coordinating volunteers If you have any questions please do not hesitate to call me Thank you in advance for your support Deborah Reyes Colby Director of Client Services Portland Family Entertainment SW th Avenue Mezzanine Level Portland OR Office Cell
Baseball Tonight tickets ParkingBill NonPrivilegedpst Four tickets are available for tonights game at pm Please let me know if you are interested Thanks Anna x Embedded Microsoft Clip Gallery

PBS Blackout Broadcast Video AvailableBill NonPrivilegedpst If you are interested in borrowing a video tape of the PBS Frontline broadcast titled Blackout please see me This video features interviews with Ken Lay Jeff Skilling and other energy industry executives Best regards Anna Californias power disaster has made energy a frontburner issue for everyone Through interviews with state and federal officials power company executives and average citizens the documentary examines whether power companies and energy trading giants have capitalized on deregulation to make tremendous profits even as users suffer power shortages min Video Notes
PGE Park Photo of YouBill NonPrivilegedpst PGE Park Opening Night Enjoy Anna

FW Real Time BudgetBill NonPrivilegedpst FYI Original Message From Long Lindsay Sent Thursday June AM To Mehrer Anna Subject RE Real Time Budget Thanks for the heads up This headcount reflects who was in this cost center in April and will not include May or June changes Lindsay Original Message From Mehrer Anna Sent Tuesday June PM To Long Lindsay Cc Williams III Bill Subject Real Time Budget Lindsay Bill Williams III Manager of Portlands Real Time Desk brought to my attention some changes that will need to be incorporated into the June budget figures Please remove Jesse Bryson Mohamed Elafandi and Monika Causholli from the budget as they are no longer in his cost center Also please add Kate Symes Thank you Best regards Anna

Real Time Budget Cc Bill NonPrivilegedpst Lindsay Bill Williams III Manager of Portlands Real Time Desk brought to my attention some changes that will need to be incorporated into the June budget figures Please remove Jesse Bryson Mohamed Elafandi and Monika Causholli from the budget as they are no longer in his cost center Also please add Kate Symes Thank you Best regards Anna

Deadline Extended City JazzFest PSU GamesBill NonPrivilegedpst The deadline has been extended to pm today for the City JazzFest and PSU Vikings games Please let me know if you are interested Thanks Anna x Original Message From Mehrer Anna Sent Thursday June PM To Portland West Desk Subject PGE Park Suite Talk First Right of Refusal One of the benefits of our suite at PGE Park is that we have the first right of refusal on nonPortland Family Entertainment events such as PSU Football games and the City JazzFest concert ENA will periodically receive notices of such events so as to determine our level of interest in purchasing the tickets before they are available to the general public NonPortland Family Entertainment ticket purchase opportunities are for Enron employees and the tickets may not be resold to outside parties If you are interested in purchasing tickets for either the PSU Football games or City JazzFest please notify me via email by pm Pacific Time Friday June These tickets are to be purchased by the employee The entire suite must be purchased by Enron employees in order for us to obtain the tickets Twentytwo tickets per event are available are seats and stools are standing room The price for City JazzFest Sunday July is for tickets about per ticket The price for all PSU Vikings games tickets each is about per game per person and all games must be purchased We will proceed with ticket purchase and distribution after you establish your commitment Please let me know if you have any questions Best regards Anna x Description of City JazzFest This full day music fest will feature Jeff Lorber Spyro Gyra Marc Antoine and the headlining package Dave Koz Friends including Michael McDonald Brian Culbertson and Norman Brown The show is produced by House Of Blues Concerts An intimate concert setting has been developed at PGE Park that will feel like a small amphitheatre but with all the new amenities PGE Park has to offer
